mapper.insert: insert into sky_take_out.employee (name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name},#{username},#{password},#{phone},#{sex},#{idNumber},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
